short_description: This is my personal portfolio showcasing some projects I've worked on
long_description: My personal portfolio showcasing some of the projects I’ve worked on. It also includes a bit about me and my skills in web development.

short_description: A website for our concept of making the pre-party the main event
long_description: A website for FörFesteriet, an initiative highlighting pre-parties at Linköping University. It helps students plan and attend unique pre-parties that become the main event of the evening.

short_description: A app built for a growin clothing brand to showcase products and style
long_description: A mobile app created for NoriStudio, a startup clothing brand focused on t-shirts. The app makes it easy to showcase products and support sales and marketing.
